text: Can you help me modify a reminder for paying bills on March 20th at 12 PM?
Sure. I need your token, what is it?
I don't know, how can I get it?
Let me check. What is your email and password?
My email is admin@example.com and password is adminpass.
Your token is m9n8b7v6c5x4z3a2s1. Now, please give me the description of the reminder.
The content is 'Pay bills' and the time is '2023-03-20 12:00:00'.
